alert.name: Nodes Down in Mastering Apache Cassandra Cluster

panels.title: cassandra internals (timeouts, reapirs, data size, open tcp connections, load, compactions)

list.name: env
list.query: show tag values from /cpu/ with key="env";

list.name: app
list.query: show tag values from /cpu/ with key="app" where "env" = '$env';

list.name: region
list.query: show tag values from /cpu/ with key="region" where "app" = '$app' and "env" = '$env';
